gold: Since 2009 , the final consumption expenditure of French households on clothing has remained relatively stable , ranging at 36 billion euros in 2017.
Fashion purchasing habits Among French respondents in a survey conducted in 2017 , about a third stated purchasing fashion clothing or accessories at least once every three months.
In addition to this , 20 percent of surveyed consumers spent between 101 and 200 euros on fashion goods during the 2017 winter seasonal sales .
